item.title: team projects
item.author: citysec@protonmail.com
item.description: ** If you have a project you wish to advertise for collaboration, email us at citysec@protonmail.com and we’ll add you to the list! join a team, push some code, and hack: NetSec AppSec Operating Systems (kernel-level and user-level) Hardware Hacking Reverse Engineering Malware Analysis Cryptography Open Source Red Team vs. Blue team
